metadata.title: CVE-2021-26259 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in htmldoc in v1.9.12. Heap buffer overflow inrender_table_row(),in ps-pdf.cxx may lead to arbitrary code execution anddenial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-26259` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

htmldoc - 1.8.27-8ubuntu1.1+esm2
htmldoc-common - 1.8.27-8ubuntu1.1+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.27-8ubuntu1.1+esm2').
